source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.
edited_line: The Gospel demands active cultural engagement and intellectual rigor.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.
edited_line: Retreating into religious enclaves is not an option for Christians today.

caption_version: Retreating into religious enclaves is not an option for Christians today. Engage with the culture actively.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.
edited_line: The time for passive Christianity has ended; robust cultural apologetics are now urgent.

caption_version: The era of passive Christianity is over. The urgent need for robust cultural apologetics is undeniable.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

caption_version: Contemporary Western civilization stands at a crossroads, systematically dismantled by decades of secular indoctrination.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.

source_title: Reclaiming the Aeropagus - by Marcus B. Peter, Th.D.
